siteMetadata.name: Liza Katz
siteMetadata.title: Liza Katz | Full-Stack Developer & GenAI Consultant | RAG, LLMs, AI Agents
siteMetadata.description: Seasoned Full-Stack Developer & GenAI Consultant | Ex-Elastic | RAG, Agents, LLMs, Search Optimization
siteMetadata.about:
Seasoned software engineer and team lead specializing in GenAI, search, and scalable systems. I build RAG applications, AI agents, and hybrid search solutions using Python, TypeScript, Next.js, and modern frameworks.

As a consultant, I've delivered end-to-end GenAI projects for clients across industries. My background spans ad-tech, finance, and big data with deep expertise in Elasticsearch, OpenSearch, and LLM-powered applications.

Recent wins: Webby Award for "Human or Not" and Google AI Hackathon winner for "Tube Uni."

Available for GenAI consulting, partnerships, public speaking, and private workshops.

markdownRemark.excerpt: I’m honored to share that I’ve been recognized as a Top Voice in Search Tech by Pulse Support as part of their carefully curated showcase of influential search…
markdownRemark.html:
I’m honored to share that I’ve been recognized as a Top Voice in Search Tech by Pulse Support as part of their carefully curated showcase of influential search technology professionals from around the world.

The Recognition

Pulse Support’s “Top Voices in Search-Tech” initiative highlights impactful professionals who are shaping the search technology landscape. Being included in this showcase alongside other industry leaders is both humbling and exciting - it reflects the work I’ve been doing over the past 20+ years in search, observability, and now GenAI.

Read the Full Interview

Check out the complete interview and learn more about my perspectives on search technology: Top Voices in Search Tech: Liza Katz

I’m grateful to Pulse Support for this recognition and the opportunity to share insights with the broader search community. Here’s to continued innovation in making information more discoverable and actionable for everyone!

frontmatter.title: Recognized as a Top Voice in Search Tech by Pulse Support
frontmatter.description: I was honored to be featured in Pulse Support's 'Top Voices in Search Tech' initiative, sharing insights about my journey in search technologies and GenAI.
